about_the_game:
Dear Valued Player,

We sincerely apologize for developing a game that appears to be too challenging for your esteemed gaming skills. We understand that not everyone possesses the immense prowess and intellectual fortitude required to conquer TYRONE SOULZ. But fear not, for we have an extraordinary solution that caters to those, shall we say, in dire need of assistance.

We are happy to present this DLC (Difficulty Lowering Compromise), a modification to TYRONE SOULZ that caters specifically to those who struggle to rise to the occasion. The newly added 'Bitch Ass Pussy Mode' difficulty is designed to gracefully mitigate the overwhelming nature of the game, providing a lifeline to those who wander aimlessly in the depths of mediocrity. In this mode, the powerful Tyrone will be neutered in various ways, making him easier, but less satisfying, to defeat.

We hope that you will perceive this generous DLC offer as a testament to our commitment to inclusivity, catering to those who are unable to embrace the trials and tribulations that define a true gamer. Admittedly, not everyone can be a gaming virtuoso, but rest assured, we are here to momentarily elevate you from the depths of your well-deserved ineptitude.

May this DLC provide you with a modicum of redemption while gently reminding you of your distinct place in the gaming hierarchy.

Wishing you the utmost 'success,'
Team SNEED
